entries.name: F.I.N.D (Frequency Identification and Noise Diminution)
entries.description: FIND is an online hackathon where participants tackle a problem statement through collaborative brainstorming. This year's theme centers on signal processing and communication systems, with a focus on topics such as amplitude modulation, frequency spectrum analysis, and noise filtering — essential skills widely applied in industry. Solve the challenge within the given time frame and stand a chance to win exciting cash prizes !
entries.tagline: Extraction of the Encoded !

entries.name: Cosmotheatre
entries.description: The Cosmotheatre is a state-of-the-art facility designed to immerse visitors in the wonders of the universe through captivating visual experiences and educational programming. Combining elements of a traditional theatre with the expansive knowledge of astronomy, a cosmotheatre serves as a dynamic hub for exploring celestial phenomena, the cosmos, and our place within it.
entries.tagline: Explore the Universe, Experience the Wonder.

entries.name: AeroChase
entries.description: In this exciting drone racing event, teams will be formed with the primary objective of designing, building, and customizing their drones from scratch and take part in the various rounds. Each team will be responsible for not only constructing the drone but also ensuring it meets the performance and technical specifications required to excel in various competitions
entries.tagline: Soar to Victory : Where Innovation Meets Flight

entries.name: Starlight Snapshots
entries.description: Step into the realm of stars and celestial wonders! In this online astrophotography competition, we invite you to showcase your talent by capturing the breathtaking beauty of the night sky, celestial bodies, and cosmic phenomena. Whether it’s the stunning sweep of the Milky Way, a close-up of the moon’s surface, or the mesmerizing trails of stars in long-exposure shots, use your creativity and technical prowess to capture space like never before.Unveil the mysteries of the universe through your lens—where every shot tells a story of the cosmos.
entries.tagline: Capturing Cosmos, Picturing Universe

entries.name: Virtual Verse
entries.description: Virtual Verse hints at offline VR games by SES, where virtual experiences come to life. It's a dream realized, merging fantasy with technology for immersive play. Players step into VR worlds crafted by SES, blurring the lines between reality and fiction. Led by innovative minds, this project promises to redefine gaming experiences, offering a surreal journey beyond traditional gameplay.
entries.tagline: Step Into Fantasy—Where Reality Meets the Virtual Dream!

entries.name: Pixel Perfect
entries.description: In this fun and creative challenge, participants will be provided with a target image. Using specified AI image generation tools, they must recreate an image as close to the original as possible, within a limited number of prompts and without using specific restricted phrases.
entries.tagline: Unleash Creativity, Match the Image!

entries.name: Celestial Quest: AI Challenge
entries.description: Celestial Quest encourages participants to dive into the depths of AI by developing models that can perform complex image classification using latent embeddings. Participants will tackle a unique problem statement while building skills and showcasing creativity.
entries.tagline: Where AI Meets Limitless Ideas

entries.name: Lockout Tournament
entries.description: Welcome to the Lockout Tournament 3.0 by Ingenuity! Get ready for intense one-on-one programming battles where participants tackle randomly generated problems, earning points to advance while winners move on and losers are eliminated. Join us during MERAZ for an electrifying display of programming prowess. Register now and let your ingenuity shine!
entries.tagline: Code and Conquer

entries.name: RoboKabaddi
entries.description: RoboKabaddi is a robotic combat event where robots enter the opposing team's  arena to score points by retrieving objects based on their distance from the goal. The farther the object is from the robot's home arena, the more points it earns. To score, the robot must successfully return the object to its arena without being intercepted or tagged out by the opposing team's bot.
entries.tagline: Fast, Fearless and Techy Tackles

entries.name: Lets-Get-Hacked
entries.description: We will be hacking as many devices as possible of those who attend the session, And then we will be explaining how we did it and how to stay protected from these sort of attacks in the future. ( We still can't guarantee that all the devices will be hacked or affected.)

entries.name: CyberQuest : Treasure Hunt
entries.description: Dive into the world of cryptography and blockchain with CipherQuest, a high-stakes treasure hunt. Solve puzzles, crack codes, and uncover clues in a race to the final treasure. Featuring challenges in cryptography, smart contracts, and cybersecurity, this event is the ultimate test for tech enthusiasts eager to push their skills to the limit.
entries.tagline: Crack the Code, Claim the Gold!

entries.name: PitchBlock
entries.description: PitchBlock invites teams to present their innovative tech product ideas or startup concepts. While we are excited to see blockchain and Web3-based solutions, we also welcome a wider range of tech-focused projects, making it easier for everyone to participate. Judging will focus on creativity, feasibility, and business potential, with extra points for blockchain applications. Whether you’re a blockchain pro or just starting, PitchBlock is your opportunity to pitch your vision to industry experts and win exciting prizes!
entries.tagline: Vision to Venture—Lead Web3!

entries.name: AutomateX
entries.description: AutomateX is a hackathon focused on building practical solutions to automate everyday automated workflows, and custom applications. The event emphasizes hands-on implementation, with the goal of delivering functional prototypes that address real-world problems by the end of the hackathon.
entries.tagline: Innovating Daily Life with Google Solutions !

entries.name: Beyond Sight
entries.description: A blindfold painting duo painting competition
entries.tagline: Brushstrokes and Blunders: A Hilarious Art Adventure!

entries.name: Luminous Ink
entries.description: A tattoo Making Competition
entries.tagline: Uncover your hidden glow: A night of luminous, temporary tattoos!

entries.name: Bridging the Blanks
entries.description: Ab online theme based art Competition
entries.tagline: Fill the void, bridge the gap, let your artistic voice clap!

entries.name: In10sity
entries.description: An offline group dance competition
entries.tagline: Step It Up: Dance Beyond Boundaries!

entries.name: Dance Solitaire
entries.description: An offline solo dance competition

entries.name: Virtual Groove
entries.description: An online solo dance competition
entries.tagline: Dance Beyond Distance, Groove Online.

entries.name: Euphony
entries.description: An Online Singing competition
entries.tagline: Where screen transform into stages!!

entries.name: SurReal
entries.description: An offline singing competition
entries.tagline: Soulful sur, rhythmic taal

entries.name: SHREDDED:Battle of Bands
entries.description: Band Competition
entries.tagline: Where Music Sparks the Fight!

entries.name: CinéMeraz
entries.description: CinéMeraz is all about capturing special moments of “ Meraz”  in your smartphone/camera while enjoying them. This is a one-person event in which the participant has to record the short clips of “Meraz” right from the beginning of the fest, then at last have to submit a compiled video made up of these short clips.
entries.tagline: CinéMeraz: Unleash Your Meraz Moments, Capture. Connect. Compile.

entries.name: SUS - Shot Ur Story
entries.description: This will be an open-to-all contest as we will be accepting online submissions of short movies through a Google form.
entries.tagline: Embark on a Cinematic Odyssey: Craft Your Narrative Through the Lens

entries.name: Déjà vu
entries.description: This will be an open-to-all contest as we will be accepting online submissions of a small segment from a movie or web series based on the theme provided.
entries.tagline: Wait a minute! I've seen this before...

entries.name: General Quiz
entries.description: A fun quiz on topics Music, Entertainment, Literature, Arts and Sports
entries.tagline: Finally, a Place to Show Off All That Couch Coaching!

entries.name: NSFW quiz
entries.description: Not safe for work 🤫
entries.tagline: Do not peek👀

entries.name: Artvile - Illustrator competition
entries.description: Are you an art lover ? Here’s the opportunity for you to show all your creativity through illustrations. Meraz 4.0 provides you a platform to be creative and bag a lot of prizes. Just be Creative!
entries.tagline: Unleash Your Imagination: Illustrate the Extraordinary!

entries.name: Murder Mystery
entries.description: A mystery solving event for detectives!!
entries.tagline: Bringing out the Sherlock Holmes in you🧐

entries.name: Photo Of the Fest
entries.description: An immersive photography event capturing spontaneous moments and genuine emotions. Unleash your creativity, explore candid shots, and celebrate the beauty of unposed moments. Whether you're a seasoned photographer or a casual enthusiast, this event is your canvas to capture life's unscripted stories through the lens
entries.tagline: Unveil Life's Unscripted Beauty Through Your Lens

entries.name: Online Theme Photography
entries.description: Participate  for a captivating virtual experience where participants can showcase their unique perspectives on the given theme
entries.tagline: Capture, Conquer, Clasp rewards

entries.name: Shutter Quest
entries.description: Participants will draw themes or specific items randomly, and the challenge is to capture a stunning photo inspired by their chosen element. It's a journey of spontaneity and creativity, turning ordinary moments into extraordinary images

entries.name: Attire Spectra
entries.tagline: Defy the norm. Redefine fashion

entries.name: Art Hunt
entries.tagline: Unlock the clues, Discover the art, Claim the treasure!

entries.name: Symphoria
entries.description: Listen up, instrumental legends! The virtual spotlight is yours—step up and let your melodies shine in our Online Solo Instrumental Competition. Whether you rule the piano keys, shred on the guitar, or command any other instrument, this is your moment to display your talent and innovation. 🎶🎸🎹
entries.tagline: Hit the right notes and show the world your sound—it's time to play your way to the crown!

entries.name: अभिव्यक्ति
entries.description: "अभिव्यक्ति" एक एकल काव्य प्रतियोगिता है, जिसमें प्रतिभागी अपनी मौलिक हिंदी रचनाएँ प्रस्तुत करेंगे। प्रतियोगिता दो चरणों में आयोजित की जाएगी: पहले चरण में प्रतिभागियों की रचनाओं की गहराई, मौलिकता और शब्दों की रचनात्मकता के आधार पर चयन किया जाएगा, और अंतिम चरण में चयनित प्रतिभागियों को दर्शकों के समक्ष अपनी प्रस्तुति देने का अवसर मिलेगा। अंतिम चरण में उन्हें दर्शकों की प्रतिक्रिया, आवाज और उच्चारण, भावभंगिमा और समग्र प्रभाव के आधार पर अंक दिए जाएंगे। प्रतियोगिता में नियमों का कड़ाई से पालन करना अनिवार्य है, जिसमें प्रॉप्स या अनुचित भाषा का उपयोग वर्जित है, और प्रतिभागियों को अपनी रचना की हार्ड कॉपी जमा करनी होगी। न्यायाधीश का निर्णय अंतिम और बाध्यकारी होगा।
entries.tagline: स्वर में छिपी कला, शब्दों में अभिव्यक्ति की शक्ति

entries.name: Promptopia
entries.description: Promptopia is a prompt writing challenge where participants are presented with a variety of intriguing prompts. Each participant selects one prompt and crafts a unique, imaginative piece based on it. To add an extra twist, bonus elements are provided daily, which participants can incorporate into their work to enhance their creativity and storytelling.
entries.tagline: From a Single Spark, a Story Ignites!

entries.name: IIT Bh-Model United Nations
entries.description:
"ITBh-MUN" is your chance to debate, negotiate and create change! The place wherein your ideas and intellect will get their chance to create a global impact and you will provide solutions to shape the future of global policy. In MUN the participating delegates will engage in intensive debate, diplomacy and collaboration to formulate decisions on global issues that involve diplomatic skills and critical thinking. You can have a team of two for a particular arena or be a standalone participant too. Good debaters and performers will surely be awarded and appreciated.Committee: United Nations Security Council (UNSC). Agenda:The Conflict in Yemen: A Path to Humanitarian Relief and Long-Term Stability Amid Regional Rivalries Involving Saudi Arabia and Iran
Committee: United Nations Security Council (UNSC)
Agenda: The Conflict in Yemen: A Path to Humanitarian Relief and Long-Term Stability Amid Regional Rivalries Involving Saudi Arabia and Iran
entries.tagline: Where diplomacy meets global change

entries.name: Meme-O-Rama
entries.description: Meme-O-Rama is an online Meme competition where participants create and submit memes based on some specific themes. Participants can compete individually or in small teams, creating original memes that adhere to specific guidelines. Memes are posted on an Instagram page. They are judged based on creativity, relevance to the theme, and audience engagement. The top memes are awarded prizes based on a combination of judges' scores and public reactions.

entries.name: Pukaar
entries.description: Experience the raw energy of Nukkad Natak!. This powerful street play brings social issues to life with passion, humor, and heart. With minimal props and dynamic performances, it’s an exciting, spontaneous way to engage the crowd and make a real impact. Whether you love acting, music, or just want to make a difference, join us to be part of this vibrant, interactive theater that speaks directly to the people. Let’s create something unforgettable together!
entries.tagline: Voices of the Street, Echoes of Change!

entries.id: feel the beat pass the heat
entries.name: FEEL THE BEAT PASS THE HEAT
Chess Tournament
entries.description: Put your chess skills to the test! In this exciting challenge, players will compete in a structured tournament, advancing through rounds and facing diverse opponents. Strategy, focus, and adaptability are key to claiming victory.
entries.tagline: Strategize, Compete, Conquer!

entries.name: Basketball Tournament
entries.description: Basketball tournament will be conducted in Meraz this year for all the college and university students in chhattisgarh. Assemble your 7 players squad to compete with the best teams this year.
entries.tagline: Battle of Ballers !

entries.name: Power Lifting & Fitness
entries.description: Power lifting and general fitness is a challenging competition conducted in Meraz for this year for all college and university students in Chhattisgarh. This competition provides a platform to showcase your strength and break some PR’s. We will have bench-press , deadlift and pull-up challenges and participants can participate individually. Every person is encouraged to engage and contribute in a setting that fosters equal opportunities and prevents any form of discrimination.
entries.tagline: Strength Unleashed: Where Power Meets Passion

entries.name: FUTSAL
entries.description: Do you have a passion for Futsal and want to have a adrenaline rush by competing with the best !. This is the right platform for you and your team to showcase your team spirit, skills and strength under the umbrella of Meraz 5.0 in IIT Bhilai
entries.tagline: Six-a-side showdown
